original_solution_mapping.L1: The boat had 20 - 3 = <<20-3=17>>17 sheep make it to shore.
original_solution_mapping.L3: 10 cows on the boat - 6 drowned = <<10-6=4>>4 cows made it to the shore.
original_solution_mapping.L4: 17 sheep + 4 cows + 14 dogs = <<17+4+14=35>>35 animals made it to shore.

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 838.
    Returns: the total number of animals that made it to the shore.
    """
    # L1
    initial_sheep = 20 # 20 sheep
    sheep_drowned = 3 # 3 of the sheep drowned
    sheep_made_it = initial_sheep - sheep_drowned

    # L2
    multiplier_cows_drowned = 2 # Twice as many cows drowned as did sheep
    cows_drowned = multiplier_cows_drowned * sheep_drowned

    # L3
    initial_cows = 10 # 10 cows
    cows_made_it = initial_cows - cows_drowned

    # L4
    initial_dogs = 14 # 14 dogs
    total_animals_made_it = sheep_made_it + cows_made_it + initial_dogs

    # FA
    answer = total_animals_made_it
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: The boat had {initial_sheep} - {sheep_drowned} = <<{initial_sheep}-{sheep_drowned}={sheep_made_it}>>{sheep_made_it} sheep make it to shore.
{initial_cows} cows on the boat - {cows_drowned} drowned = <<{initial_cows}-{cows_drowned}={cows_made_it}>>{cows_made_it} cows made it to the shore.
{sheep_made_it} sheep + {cows_made_it} cows + {initial_dogs} dogs = <<{sheep_made_it}+{cows_made_it}+{initial_dogs}={total_animals_made_it}>>{total_animals_made_it} animals made it to shore.

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L3: 10 cows on the boat - 6 drowned = <<10-6=4>>4 cows made it to the shore.
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L4: 17 sheep + 4 cows + 4 dogs = <<17+4+4=25>>25 animals made it to shore.

explanation: Input misrepresentation. The value for 'cows_made_it' (4) was used instead of 'initial_dogs' (14).
